title: Team Builder Queue Times.
body:
Building a game and looking for all the roles to fill takes more then 30-40 minutes on average. and queue time after that is also quite ridiculous.

Please Riot do something about this >_

replies.body: its just there for people who absolutely refuse to play anywhere else, but yes it is an extremely long queue it normally picks up whenever there is a new champ out, eventually they will make blind pick obsolete which will give a rise to team builder

like what... close normal ques? Riot have said for months that Team Builder, Draft Normals as well as full-time Twisted Treeline and Dominion aren't viable in OCE because of the lack of players.

The only reason they kept team builder was because lots of people played it when the Map VU came in and they thought it might remain popular. Obviously not. Wouldn't be surprised if they take it away all together again or put it on a less frequent rotation (like Twisted Treeline) rather than it being a daily que.

The truth is riot can't do much about this. The reason the queue's are taking for ever is because no one plays teambuilder, and the reason no one plays team builder is because the queue's are taking for ever... See where this is going?

The only thing riot probably could do is take away normal queue's and I'm sure 99% of the lol community doesn't want that
